text: 16.4: FG 15.23-29Por maaŋ ana muuŋgiap, mbe mba ŋgui bakɨvi ga ruav, Zisas mba farasegi 12 thɨgi ŋaara gumgi gum mbe Zerusareman kav Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi gari gumgir pani, mba fhum Zerusareman kav suaŋgi buni, mbe mba bunin Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi ga nzuai. Mbe mbe nzuav khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde kha buni zɨn ŋgɨri.”
